      • Overlay

        public Overlay(MediaItem mediaItem,
       java.lang.String overlayId,
       long startTimeMs,
       long durationMs)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        mediaItem - The media item owner
        overlayId - The overlay id
        startTimeMs - The start time relative to the media item start time
        durationMs - The duration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file type is not PNG or the startTimeMs and durationMs are incorrect.

        public void setStartTime(long startTimeMs)

        Parameters:
